dict.acceptation: 消极的，否认的；[数]负的；[心]反抗性的；无预期结果的；
否定词语；否定的观点；消极性；[摄]底片；

sent.orig: Thus, the negative marker or negative negative scope and negative focus within it.
sent.trans: 否定焦点是在否定范围内，实际被否定的成分，它是句子语义的重心所在。

sent.orig: Thus, the negative marker specifier serves to confine the negative scope and negative focus within it.
sent.trans: 否定标记词于是就具有了限定否定范围的句法作用。

sent.orig: Sixth, put aside all the negative and pessimistic ideas, not to mention the negative, negative words.
sent.trans: 第六，摒除一切悲观消极意念，不要说否定、负面的话语。

sent.orig: What remain to be created are types O-negative and AB-negative.
sent.trans: 仍有待建立的类型是O型阴性和AB阴性。

sent.orig: That is, it is a kind of higher level negative to negative of cash basis accounting.
sent.trans: 可以这么说，这是对现金制会计的一种更高水平的否定之否定。
